name: F Advance Tips

pages.title: Alien Hedge Alchemy
pages.text: To unlock this research, you normally need to enter Nether and the End, which you can't do in skyblock. The research is unlocked once you enter Hell/The End biome, which you can obtain by using a Terraformer.

pages.title: Mining the nether
pages.text: This is a crazy idea but it works. OpenComputers Drones CAN enter nether through the portal. You can program it to place a miner and mine nether. You can also build there any structure.$(br)If you place a teleporter there and want to loophole the system, don't worry, you'll be teleported to the overworld after just one tick.
